data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Chandel, Manipur, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chandel, Manipur, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Chandel, Manipur, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Chandel, Manipur, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Chandel that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Meitei (Manipur Muslim) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, it’s possible most of the 118,982 lost people in  Chandel, Manipur, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Chandel against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,340 believers in the county of Chandel the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

location.name: Chandel
location.people_groups_list: Halam Rupini, Gura, Thoubalkonou, Murasing, Hrangkhol
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Halam Rupini (4,500), Gura (300), Thoubalkonou (1,400), Murasing (14,000), Hrangkhol (6,900)
